pages.title: about
pages.text: What’s this blog about?Hi, I’m e-dmi, and this is my logbook. Here I publish my thoughts and what’s happening to me as well as articles or cheat sheets. They are usually in English, ‘cause one of the main purposes of this blog is to improve my English skills. Although, sometimes I write in Russian. Thanks for reading :D Who am I?– student in cosmophysics from Russia– participant of the IceCube collaboration– C, haskell, python, JavaScript coder– popularizer of science– interested in data science– interested in theoretical physics– playing the piano How to contact me?Use vk.com or twitter.You can also write to e-mail: e-dmi@ro.ru.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: The logbook is startingThis night, on the 13’th of August, 2017, when maximum intensity of the Perseids occur, I’m happy to start this logbook. Unfortunatelly I can barely see anything due to cloudiness and the weather forecast isn’t also great for that, ‘cause this evening a thunderstorm is predicted. Anyway, I hope I’ll watch some Perseids this week. Sitting here and looking in the dark skies is useless, so I’ll just make a commit of this message and go to sleep.
